transcript.text: Ah! I cut myself (x2) with that wooden thing
Don't act like Bruce Lee at home. There's my little dangling piece of skin. Love it
Well, as you understood with that awesome move today's FAQ time so let's do it!
I asked you, as usual, on Tweeter to ask me any questions you want with #SqueezieQuestion
So, when will you make another "We try weird objects"?
Look, that's funny because not long ago
I talked to Mcfly and Carlito and I told them
Guys I can't wait to be opening WTF objects again
And they answered "yeah, same only if we don't set fire to your desk"
'Cuz we're dads now unlike you
I was angry because ME TOO I'm the dad of an amazing dog that just had his 1st birthday
HAPPY BIRHTDAY NATSU! He's not there today I'm so disappointed (ç_ç)
Anyway, just rambling. I'd love to shoot one quickly during the start of school to be frank
But I'm not going to Japan this summer
So I have to find a way to buy objects from the Don Quichotte shop without travelling to Japan
But perhaps there're other websites that sell the same items
In any case, if you're lucky to travel to Japan, enjoy it!
Go take a look in that shop you'll find very fun and incongruous items
It's useless but that doesn't matter
When will you... there're too many questions beginning like that.
You expect too much from me, that's not good
When will you make another video with Bigflo and Oli?
Well, when they release a new album. There you go
Are you happy to see theses images again?
Frankly they make me feel positive because they remind of where I come from
And it's important, in life, to remember where we come from but also where we're going
And also to understand where it comes from
*giggles* Especially because it's a very good memory
'Cuz I was with my best friend when I made that video
And we kept this amazing memory
Unlike the floor which was full of eggs, it was such a mess
'Cuz we would basically smash eggs on our heads in all the videos
But yeah that was great yeah
Are you aware of Maxenss' EP?
*pretending not to know*
What EP? When? *winks*
How much have you spent on Fortnite? (€)
*lets his phone fall*
*hurting*
Stop!! I don't know and I DON'T wanna know
Well I'm lucky, thanks to you, to receive all my games almost free
The editors send them to me
Then you make me save much money
Instead of using this money in a good way
Like saving it or giving it to my mom, I don't know
Well I start Fortnite and I spend it on this game
So that's horrible
The solution of that problem is simple
I have to make an effort
And ask to Epic Games to offer me skins *laughs*
Then I'll spend money on another game
But I'll still not save it *chuckles*
What's your favorite part in your current job?
Doing whatever I want, being able to do what I want
And trying to convey *french error.exe*
(What is he saying?)
Wow, I really need vacations
What I prefer is conveying positive things whatever it is
That's what I like, it's trying to teach people things if I can
Or entertaining them
But always in a positive way never in a negative one
And unlike before, I'm more careful about what I say in my videos
Because when you're excited or when you're with your friends
We can make jokes that are okay with them
But that are not okay when we're being watched by people we don't know
We can convey such incredible, powerful things that can really make people feel good
That you have to be aware and lean towards that happiness, those entertaining moments
When you breathe
When you have the giggles, I don't know
That's what I really like, that's my favorite part
And also the fact that I don't have a boss!
A traumatising experience or just something that made you think about yourself?
Not long ago I've been through something like this
I went to a party organized by a brand and I didn't want to
But I eventually had to go for certain reasons
And I utterly hated the whole thing
For real! Everybody was filming each other
Everyone was all well dressed
It was like a competition of "who's the prettiest? who's the best?"
Actually, it may seem silly but it was traumatising for me *chuckles*
Now THAT'S something traumatising
How great is this privileged baby life
I mean there're some people who want to go to these events all their life
But it's so lame
Just hanging out with my friends or going for a walk with Natsu
That's so... that's something way better that I wanna do
Actually, the simple things which are right under your nose are the best
I think my real place is in a park hanging out with my dog and cleaning his poop
This is where I feel good and alive *laughs*
When will you take in a boyfriend or a girlfriend for Natsu?
Damn! I want it so badly!
Actually I really want him to know what's true love
By the way I have doubts that he's gay to be frank
Since he usually wants to have sex with his BFF
Which doesn't bother me at all!
But I'm sad because there won't be litlle puppies
Especially little Natsu babies would be fun
When will you release the big video for your 10 millions suscribers?
Ah! I'm gonna explain a little bit.
Basically I'm gonna make a surprise to several persons around the world
By knocking at their home without them expecting me
And we'll go do fun activities and share a moment just the two of us
'Cuz these are my favorite moments with you
Those moments when I can talk with one person without anybody else
Just that person and I
I can discover what this person likes or does
Indeed, I can learn about that person
I think I'm gonna live one of the strongest things in my whole life
And I CAN'T wait!
It'll be released ...
There're many people who asked for it
In September, I don't know the accurate date
But I'll tell you in a next video, I'll make an announcement
We're gonna start by shooting this video
I'm late with 11 millions suscribers now
But that's your fault, you're so fast!
You're all suscribing
Will there be other big projects?
As a result, I've juste answered this question
Did you see that? I managed well the video
That's great! I'm so talented today
For real, there's another big project that'll pop up later in the year
I had already talked about it in a video with Julfou and Theo. Flashback!
We made a meeting for a big project that'll be released in September or October
Ma Shaa Allah (x3)
I can't tell you more right now
But it'll be very different from all I've done till now as big projects
I don't think I can make a short film
But I found something between two... Aaah! I can't tell you more (ç_ç)
That's terrible!
Hey! I already explained what the topic of the 10 millions suscribers video is going to be
So you're gonna be patient for this one, oh!
I've learned that it wasn't going too well with Maxenss. How can he manage to conquer you again?
*sighs* I don't know where you got that but yeah since a while it's not ... working out between us
I think I'm gonna call him so we can sort it out
*phone noises*
Maxenss: Allo?
Lucas: Yeah... (Maxenss' making weird noises) there's a dude on tweeter
Who got that our relationship wasn't going well
*Maxenss laughs*
Maxenss: Tell me the whole thing, Lucas.
Lucas: Actually I'm making an FAQ and there's someone who says that he noticed our relationship isn't going well
Lucas: Is it linked to the distance between you two? Because of the concerts?
Lucas: I barely bear your absence because of your tour with Vso
Lucas: And... I'd like you to text me a little bit more
Lucas: Maybe it'll fix this
Maxenss: Look ... I want to but uh...
Maxenss: But I'm feeling well there so it'd be like forcing me, you see.
*hangs up*
*Laughs*
Maxenss! I love you, bro! You have to be an actor!
Have you planned to have a baby with a Youtuber girl and be a family?
And what do you think about Kylian Mbappé?
I'm glad you asked because I've planned to have a baby and be a family with Kylian Mbappé
When will you make a video to raise awareness about animal abondonment during summer vacations?
I mean during all the time but now it's important (cats, dogs, rabbits, rodents...)
You clearly made a point Ohnonpasencore! (which means oh no not again in french)
*giggles* Your tweeter nickname fits well the situation
Well, let's enjoy this FAQ to do it!
As you may know there're TOO many people that abandon their pets during summer
So they prefer to forget their responsibilities that they accepted to have when they adopted their pet
When they accepted their pet's love
And they kick them out in the streets
Or let them on the roads
Or tie them to a stake and forget them
Or throwing them above the SCPA's fences
In short, many horrible things
Know that, for those who go in vacations and have no means to keep their pet, you chose to have a pet
So you chose to make concessions
For example: "Oh no I can't go in vacations because of my pet so I'm gonna abandon him to leave"
Well NO, you don't do that, you take care of your pet instead. That's how it is.
Or you ask a friend to keep your pet, you manage to leave with different dates of vacations than your friend's
Or you let your pet in an animal hotel (so cute *-*). That exists.
You have to find solutions for your pet
And you don't abandon your pet like a son of a b...
You've grown so much on YouTube since you began
Many people say it, so how's your channel gonna evolve?
Are you gonna let the gaming down more than now?
I don't know.. no. There're some people who told me "you're stopping the gaming, you quit forever"
Well no, because when I play games I usually do it on Twitch
I don't stream a lot currently. But I have a big plan for the start of school period
With streaming on special moment but I'll tell you about it when it's time.
So I'll focus the gaming on Twitch
And I'll focus the other side on YouTube even if there'll still be gaming videos on YouTube
Actually, I do what I like. Currently I love telling stories
Talking about funny topics. Making videos with my friends on various topics
Making things outside the studio
Making musics
I follow what I like to do. And games are less interesting to me than the rest of what I do.
That's great I think it proves that I can do new things
But you're right there will be less gaming on my channel
Than back in 2014, 2015... where there was only gaming
But well, there's Twitch, there'll be gaming on it
So you'll still have your gaming dose
Are you having a good time right now?
Yeah!
Which closed sea of Western Asia is aside with Jordan and Israel?
The Dead Sea!
Do you think you're gonna make a short film of your old characters? Just for the memory!
He's negociating! Come on just for the memory!
As this dude says so well there "that would be cool, but I think it's something in the past to him"
Actually he's right. That's past. I made that at a certain period
I already talked about that in another FAQ. Even what I'm doing now
Like threads, conspiracy theories
I hope that in one year or before I'll make something different
In order to keep getting pleasure in what I do
And that you can keep loving what I do
Because everything evolves and changes and that's great
Oh we've got eight questions in one question
"Do you sleep enough at night?"
No, not enough. I'd always like to sleep more than I do
"Do you eat well during breakfast?"
I usually don't eat breakfasts because I'm hungry during the morning
But I started eating Special K (cereals) in almond milk
Is this a good thing or not? I don't know but it feels good
"Do you drink enough water?"
I started to drink more water a while ago but there's a while since I drink less water than this while ago
(What is this supposed to mean? Lol)
That's the worst answer!
My prince deserves to be healthy
*laughs* Well, I lack a bit of water. So if you want to deliver me some water bottles, go ahead
How did you get the idea of making videos on creepy threads? I love that concept, keep doing this
I love that concept too. I love telling stories
And I've always liked that but I had nothing to tell
Except in quick story videos where I talk about my life
I love threads and especially I love to tell them in my way
And then Clément make an amazing job with editing images
So it gives very great results
In any case, you've been many to tell me that you loved it and I'm glad
I hope I'll keep this on for a moment without abusing it
But I think I had this idea when I made this video with
That voice message which I found awesome
And I realized that I could tell those stories
And I could make people live those stories
It's nothing new. I'm surely not the first to do that
But I got that idea myself
Even though other YouTubers did that before me
I said to myself "Damn I wanna tell those stories"
I'm happy about it and.. you too so!
"Don't you regret to be famous some time? Don't you wish not to be recognized some time?"
*sighs* It's such a pain! People come to me and tell me "Dude I really like what you do. That's so cool. Keep it on!"
And I look at them and I tell them "You can't tell me that, this is abuse, man!"
*chuckles* 95% of the time it happens, that's great
Especially now because it's almost only calm and mature people
Who don't want to bother me because they know what privacy is outside the videos
But they just want to tell me a little thing because they're happy to do so
And they have the opportunity
But there're some time where you have 14 people running at you
They don't care that you're alone or not
That's a little more complicated situation
But I can't blame them to be happy to see me in real life whereas they didn't expect that
Of course not. And when you're with your friends
And you see someone famous of course you go to that person
For real, there're a few disadvantages.
The only true disadvantage is when a deliverer has your number and use it too much. That's annoying
"Do you think you're gonna take in another dog?"
Yeah I do. We talked about the responsibilities of having an animal
And having a second dog is not like having a second cat
Where you just have to add another litter and another plate and that's it
You have to walk your dogs with 2 leashes
Watching over 2 dogs when they don't have their leash in the park
This is a lot of responsibilities
So yeah I think I'll adopt another dog
But not for now
"Tell us an awkward situation when you met a suscriber"
*sighs*That's horrible I don't like to do that.
But basically I was... *laughs* I just said I don't like to do that and here I am telling the story
I got off a train in Switzerland to go get food
I was returning from skiing, from Grand Montana
I went there with my friends, it was great
And when I returned from there I had to switch
Actually we were still in Switzerland
During that switch we decided to go to a fast food
At the fast food, a guy recognized me and he's very insisting
I talked with him while I was in that fast food
When I left, he followed me
He walked beside me, he kept talking to me
And I told him "Dude my train is here in 5 min, sorry I have to hurry up"
He told me "Alright, no problems"
And he hurried up while he kept talking
Until that moment nothing awkward, he told me he was a rapper
He wanted to make an album with me
But who wants Squeezie as featuring in an album?
*laughs* What kind of rapper are you?
I was arriving at my train station, my train's here
He followed me all the way and it was pretty far away from the fast food
Then I entered the wagon and he almost did too
And his friends told him "Dude stop, calm down"
He was so insisting, this situation was kinda abrupt
But he wasn't mean, he wasn't mean at all
Actually, he was strange
I was afraid that he tells me "So we make that album?"
"Uh, no I don't make a lot of music"
And that he stabs me, like that
I admit I'm overstating but that was almost like that
When will you do another big hide and seek game?
At the end of this year
Very good question, I can't wait. We'll do another one
About the end of November or half December something like that
The first video worked completely
A lot of YouTubers loved that video
You guys enjoyed it a lot too
There were a lot of "likes" and comments, you clearly liked it
You showed to me you liked it but especially to Honor that sponsored the video
Because doing a hide and seek game like that it's expensive, dude
That's why we can't do that outside the videos
So they said yes for a second episode
When the next Honor is released
So THANK YOU! You convinced them, thanks to you
I can't wait! I have plenty of ideas of hiding spots!
It's gonna be so great!
Guys this is the end of that FAQ, I answered a lot to your questions
You guys were serious, at least you learned a lot
That's that kind of video where I speak frankly about what I feel and what I think
It's a bit less funny but I hope it's still entertaining
In short, I still have some things to tell you but I'll make a specific video for that
A kind of bonus video before I go in vacation to tell you all that stuff
There're still many thing but it's not ready yet so I don't wanna be telling you crap
There's gonna be plenty of great things for the start of school period
Things that are motivating and that make me happy
That make me keep on doing what I do
At least that make me keep on doing that with pleasure
I hope your holidays are awesome
Mine begin in August
Thanks for all! I love you guys and see you in my next video!
Which will be funnier but with a heart less open
*laughs* This is the worst end
*disappointed* Okay let's go
See you!
Hey! I didn't open this!
See you in a next video! (so cute *-*)
